pages.text: $(li)The Deep Frozen Ocean is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Ocean$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this biome is composed mainly by Gravel.$(br)$(li)No type of vegetation can grow in this Biome.

$(li)No too many aquatic animals can withstand the hard conditions of this sea.$(br)$(li)Only $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/blobfish)Blobfishes$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/frilled_shark)Frilled Sharks$(/l) can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Deep Frozen Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
